com.adidas.ui.app

Class AdidasInformationalPopover

  • java.lang.Object
    • DialogFragment
      • com.adidas.ui.app.AdidasDialog
        • com.adidas.ui.app.AdidasInformationalPopover

  • public class AdidasInformationalPopover
extends AdidasDialog
    Common dialog to show informative message. Typical usage should look in the following way: 
      
   new AdidasDialogLauncher().show(
            getActivity(), 
            new AdidasInformationalPopover("title", "message"));
    In case if you will implement your own dialog based on this one you can get access to message via the following id: R.id.dialog_informational_popover_message. As a result you will get instance of AdidasTextView.
    Since:
    1.6.3
